meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>origin</kanji> of your <kanji>collar</kanji> is your <vocabulary>collar</vocabulary>! And the <vocabulary>nape of the neck</vocabulary> because that's where collars go.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
